Title: ListBox Extender
Description: ExtendedListBox provides an ASP.Net extender to the ListBox control. This extender use AJAX framework to build a user friendly multiple selection behavior.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
ExtendedListBox provides an ASP.Net extender to the ListBox control. This extender use AJAX framework to build a user friendly multiple selection behavior.

Screenshots

Without ExtendedListBox:


With ExtendedListBox:

Features

  • Can be attached to any ListBox control, databound or not
  • Supports attached ListBox's AutoPostback value
  • Buttons to select one, many or all values
  • Multiple selection of values
  • Default style provided
  • Custom styling based on CSS classes
